message.name: DESCRIPTION_EXIT
message.value: Are you sure you want to quit?

message.name: PERFORMANCE_WARNING
message.value: This option may reduce game performance!

message.name: FACEBOOK_DISCONNECT_WARNING
message.value: Are you sure you want to disconnect Facebook profile?

message.name: SERVER_UPDATE
message.value: Sorry, looks like the server is down for maintenance. Please wait a few minutes and try to reconnect.

message.name: ERROR_SAVING
message.value: An error occurred while the data was saving. The transaction was cancelled.

message.name: ERROR_SOCIAL
message.value: An error occurred while accessing the social network API.

message.name: ERROR_SOCIAL_OP
message.value: An error occurred while accessing the social network API. {errpr}

message.name: ERROR_SCENE_LOAD
message.value: An error occurred while loading data (id = {id})

message.name: ERROR_HACKING_ATTEMPT
message.value: Insufficient funds. The transaction was cancelled.

message.name: ERROR_REQUEST_FRIEND_TO_BATTLE
message.value: You can not call this player to battle.

message.name: ERROR_BANK_FAIL
message.value: Transaction failed, possibly due to high server load Please, try again later.

message.name: UNSYNCH_ERROR
message.value: Desync. The command {received} came instead of {expected}.

message.name: RECEIPT_VERIFICATION_ERROR_APPLE
message.value: Your purchase could not be verified through Apple's servers. Please try again later.

message.name: RECEIPT_VERIFICATION_ERROR_GOOGLE
message.value: Your purchase could not be verified with Google's servers. Please try again later.

message.name: INCORRECT_PROTOCOL_VERSION
message.value: Incorrect protocol version, please update the client.

message.name: BUY_RUBIES_SUCCESSFULL
message.value: Thanks for your purchase. We are at your disposal!

message.name: BUY_2_HAT
message.value: You just bought a hat. Are you sure you want to change it?

message.name: BUY_SUCCESSFUL
message.value: Your items have been purchased. They are now in your armory.

dictionary.message:
requires
{levelRequirement}

message.name: ALREADY_CRAFTED_LABEL
message.value: You've got the best item of this kind!

message.name: CRAFT_EQUIP_NOT_ENOUGH_REGS
message.value: Not enough reagents to craft for fuzzez

message.name: BUY_REACTION_RATES
message.value: Your reaction has been increased by {count}

message.name: FIRST_SHOT_DELAY
message.value: Can be used starting from turn {turn}.

dictionary.message:
Online fights. Ladies and gentlemen! Place your bets on your victory!
Fight organizers take 20% of earnings

message.name: PVP_TWO_VS_TWO_WITH_FRIEND_CARD_DESC
message.value: Select a friend who will be your partner in this battle.

message.name: PVP_WAGER_AVAILABLE_FOR
message.value: You have to be at least {level} level

message.name: PVP_WAGER_AVAILABLE_FOR_TEAM_MIN
message.value: You need to have at least {team}-soldiers team

message.name: PVP_WAGER_AVAILABLE_FOR_TEAM_MAX
message.value: You need to have no more then {team} soldiers in team

message.name: FRIEND_EXCEED_BATTLES
message.value: Your friend ran out of battles

message.name: FRIEND_MISSION_LOCKED
message.value: This boss is unavailable for your friend

message.name: NO_FRIENDS_FOR_COOP_MISSION
message.value: You have no friends online to attack this boss!

message.name: NO_FRIENDS_FOR_COOP_FIGHT
message.value: You have no friends online to fight together!

message.name: NO_FRIENDS_FOR_INVITE
message.value: All your friends are already invited!

message.name: ARENA_DELAY_DESC
message.value: You can get back to your missions in:

message.name: ARENA_DELAY_DONT_WAIT
message.value: Don't want to wait? Lust for battle?

message.name: ARENA_BUY_BATTLE
message.value: You may buy one more battle

message.name: ARENA_BUY_FIVE_BATTLES
message.value: You may buy 5 battles at once:

dictionary.message:
Play with your friends on a single device!
Just select one - and fight!

message.name: UNKNOWN_CARD_DESC
message.value: This mission is too secret to reveal right now!

message.name: BOSS_LOCKED
message.value: Now you can not attack this boss, because the path to him has not been cleared yet!

message.name: BOSS_UNAVAILABLE_TITLE
message.value: You're brave! But that alone is not enough!

message.name: BOSS_UNAVAILABLE_DESC
message.value: You are too low level to enter into such a serious battle!

message.name: UNAVAILABLE_PANEL_TITLE
message.value: Undiscovered enemy! Boss is not defeated!

message.name: UNAVAILABLE_PANEL_DESCRIPTION_1
message.value: You can't fight against this pair now - you have to beat both bosses first.

message.name: AVAILABLE_PANEL_DESCRIPTION
message.value: On each difficulty you have to fight a team of two bosses. The higher difficulty leads to greater reward.

message.name: REPLACE_IN_GROUP_CONFIRMATION
message.value: Replace your team member with this one?

message.name: CAN_NOT_ADD_IN_GROUP
message.value: You can't have more team members at your current level.

message.name: REMOVE_FROM_GROUP_CONFIRMATION
message.value: Are you sure you want to kick your friend from the team?

message.name: ALREADY_IN_TEAM
message.value: Unit is already in the team

dictionary.message:
Only attack and armor is reset.
Reaction rate remains unchanged.

Points can be reset.

message.name: NO_POINTS
message.value: There are no points to improve your stats

message.name: ARMOR_DESCRIPTION
message.value: Damage done to you is diminished, depending on your armor

message.name: ATTACK_DESCRIPTION
message.value: Damage done to your enemy is increased, depending on your attack

message.name: REACTION_DESCRIPTION
message.value: Increases the chance of getting the first turn in a duel

message.name: RATING_DESCRIPTION
message.value: Increase your rating by taking down opponents in multiplayer battles

message.name: RATING_WARNING
message.value: To get access you need to set your name first.

message.name: RATING_AWARDS_TEXT
message.value: Fight for the daily top ranking and win a unique cap every 24 hours!

message.name: LEVEL_NET_ENOUGH_FOR_SEARCH
message.value: You may only visit a friend's room only after they have reached the second level

message.name: REACTION_MENU_MSG_NONE_SELECTED
message.value: No one has boosted you yet

message.name: REACTION_MENU_MSG_NONE_PUMPED_3DAYS
message.value: Your reaction hasn't been boosted in the last 3 days

message.name: ALBUM_DESCRIPTION
message.value: My best moments in Bombix! Come in, let's fight: {app_link}

dictionary.message:
Attention!
Restriction of the video clip 15Mb.

message.name: VIDEO_LIMIT_DESC
message.value: The larger your video is, the longer it will take to upload on your page.

dictionary.message: You have an unsaved video.
Size: {value} Mb

message.name: VIDEO_SAVE_QUESTION
message.value: Upload a video to your page?

message.name: VIDEO_SAVING_DESC
message.value: It will take about 2 minutes to upload a 15 mb video with a 1 mb/s internet connection.

message.name: GO_AT_BANK
message.value: You can purchase fuzzez and rubies in a bank.

message.name: BANK_BONUS_INFO
message.value: Bonus! The more you buy the bigger bonus you get!

message.name: BANK_INCOME_PAYMENT_RUBY
message.value: Incoming payment received. {count} rubies added to your account

message.name: BANK_INCOME_PAYMENT_COIN
message.value: Incoming payment received. {count} fuzzez added to your account

message.name: BANK_DEPOSIT_DESCR
message.value: Get rubies or fuzzez within 5 days

message.name: BANK_VIP_DESCR
message.value: Get all items and weapons at once

message.name: BANK_BUNDLE_DESCR
message.value: Get all items and weapons at once

message.name: BATTLE_OFFER_PROFILE_REJECT
message.value: Your profile has changed during this battle offer

dictionary.message:
VIP-Account doubles experience and money earned in missions and boss fights. Also VIP-Account grants you unlimited access to ALL base weapons from Bombix shop, except medicaments and ruby weapons! All base weapons get MAX level!
The best way to immediately engage the game on the highest level!

message.name: DEPOSIT_BUY_SUCCESS
message.value: Congratulations! You opened new deposit! Your first day income is {count} {moneyType}.

message.name: BOSS_BATTLE_OFFER_TITLE
message.value: invites you to a fight with the boss:

message.name: SUPER_BOSS_BATTLE_OFFER_TITLE
message.value: invites you to a fight with the superboss:

message.name: SEARCHING_RANDOM_PARTNER
message.value: Please wait while server is searching for a teammate

message.name: BATTLE_REQUEST_MSG
message.value: Please wait while the server chooses an opponent

message.name: BATTLE_REQUEST_BUSY
message.value: The player is in the middle of combat and can't accept your request.

message.name: BATTLE_LOGIN_TIMEOUT
message.value: Connection time to pvp server is exceeded, the fight was cancelled.

message.name: BATTLE_REQUEST_NOT_ONLINE
message.value: Your friend is not playing the game.

message.name: PVP_SERVER_CONNECTION_CLOSED
message.value: Game was disconnected from PVP server.

message.name: PVP_SERVER_INCORRECT_BATTLE_ID
message.value: Unable to create battle: incorrect battle id!

message.name: ENTER_ID_FRIEND_IS_NOT_FRIEND
message.value: You've entered the ID of a user that is not your friend

dictionary.message:
Bombix is an online game and requires Internet access.
Please connect to the Internet and try again.

message.name: MAIN_SERVER_CONNECTION_ERROR
message.value: The server is under construction. Please, try to reconnect later.

dictionary.message:
Connection to server is lost.
Try to reconnect?

message.name: PVP_SERVER_PROFILACTIC_WORK
message.value: The pvp server is under construction

message.name: ENEMY_TURN_MSG
message.value: waiting for the enemy to complete their turn

message.name: PVP_BATTLE_STUCK
message.value: The fight was cancelled by the server, as there was no opponent activity for a long time

message.name: PVP_BATTLE_UNSYNC
message.value: The fight was cancelled due to sync errors

message.name: PVP_SERVER_DOWN
message.value: The PvP server is going to be reloaded. All bets will be refunded.

message.name: CURRENT_USER_ALREADY_IN_BATTLE
message.value: You're already in combat. Try to resend a request a bit later. If you see this error again, please, reload the game.

message.name: BATTLE_REQUEST_BANNED
message.value: The friend you are requesting has been banned.

message.name: BATTLE_REQUEST_CLIENT_ERROR
message.value: Your friend wasn't able to accept your request.

message.name: BATTLE_REQUEST_DISCONNECTED
message.value: Connection to PvP server failed during the request.

message.name: BATTLE_REQUEST_FRIEND_LACKS_MONEY
message.value: Your friend doesn't have enough money to join you!

message.name: BATTLE_REQUEST_FRIEND_LACKS_LEVEL
message.value: Your friend's level is too low!

message.name: BATTLE_REQUEST_EXCEED_BATTLES
message.value: Your friend doesn't have any battles remaining!

message.name: BATTLE_REQUEST_MISSION_LOCKED
message.value: Your friend cannot battle this boss!

message.name: BATTLE_REQUEST_PLAYER_LACKS_LEVEL
message.value: Your level is too low for this battle!

message.name: BATTLE_REQUEST_PLAYER_EXCEED_BATTLES
message.value: You don't have any battles remaining!

message.name: BATTLE_REQUEST_ARENA_IS_LOCKED
message.value: This battle mode is closed at the moment, but it will become available in a few hours!

message.name: BATTLE_REQUEST_TEAM_IS_SMALL
message.value: Your battle team is too small!

dictionary.message:
The battle has been cancelled because of low performance.
You may have kept the game minimized for a long time.

The battle was interrupted due to high latency.
You may have kept the game minimized for a long time.

The battle was cancelled because of the lack of commands from the client.
Combat log was saved on the server.

message.name: CHAT_CALL_TO_PVP
message.value: wants to call you for a fight!

message.name: EXIT_BATTLE_MSG
message.value: Do you really want to surrender?

message.name: MINIMAL_RATING_QTIP
message.value: Minimum rating required for award receiving

dictionary.message:
Wind speed and direction
Some kinds of weapon are influenced by the wind

message.name: CLAN_TEAM_MEMBER_DESC
message.value: You get a clan mate with full equipment. You can have only one clan mate into team. This unit becomes inactive, if either you or he leaves a clan.

message.name: FRIEND_TEAM_MEMBER_DESC
message.value: Such friends teammate are added in team without any equips.

message.name: NO_PROFILES_FOR_ADD_TO_TEAM
message.value: There's no one you can hire.

message.name: MEMBER_SOCLAN_ALREADY_EXIST_LIMIT
message.value: You have maximal possible number of clan mates.

message.name: PUMP_REACTION_OK
message.value: Your friend got a +1 boost to reaction rate

message.name: PUMP_REACTION_TODAY_ALREADY
message.value: You can increase friend's reaction rate only once per day.

message.name: PUMP_REACTION_ERROR
message.value: You cannot increase your own reaction rate!

message.name: PUMP_REACTION_DAY_LIMIT
message.value: The daily reaction boost limit has been reached.

message.name: PUMP_REACTION_DAY_LIMIT_ADD
message.value: You increased reaction rate for {count} friends from the chosen list.

message.name: NOT_ENOUGH_RATING_TITLE
message.value: Join the ranks of best players!

message.name: NOT_ENOUGH_RATING_DESCR
message.value: You have to score 10 rating points to join the League of Novices.

dictionary.message:
Congratulations!
Read more in the official group {Bombix_club_text}

message.name: DAILY_BONUS_TEXT
message.value: Visit us every day to maintain your bonus streak!

message.name: DEPOSIT_INCOME_MSG
message.value: How nice to receive income from deposits every day!

message.name: NEED_RUBY_BUTTON2_TEXT
message.value: Be the first to visit their house!

message.name: NEED_RUBY_CHECKBOX_TEXT
message.value: I don't need free rubies, don't show this window again

message.name: NO_FIVE_DAY_DESCR
message.value: Your friend hasn't entered the game for more than 2 months! Unfortunately, you haven't found anything.

message.name: RACE_UNAVAILABLE
message.value: Selection of this race is not allowed

message.name: RACE_BOXER_DESCR
message.value: Soldiers, whose health is tempered in fights. Legends are told about hardness of their skulls

message.name: RACE_DEMON_DESCR
message.value: Demons are cruel soldiers, devoted to their master, they don't know mercy.

message.name: RACE_RABBIT_DESCR
message.value: Rabbits are fast as lightning. Their belief in the Great Carrot allows them to heal their wounds right on the battlefield.

message.name: RACE_ZOMBIE_DESCR
message.value: Zombies - living corpses controlled by an alien will. Emotionless and resistant to pain, they'll bring you total victory.

message.name: RACE_CAT_DESCR
message.value: Cats are cunning and skillful tricksters, they always have something up their sleeves to surpirse their enemy.

message.name: RACE_DRAGON_DESCR
message.value: Nobody believed in them. Everyone thought they were simply a fairy tale. But they returned, wielding fire! Real. Flying ... Dragons!

message.name: RACE_ROBOT_DESCR
message.value: Swarm of mechanical bots joined the combat! There steel brains know no mercy. The enemy will flee in terror.

message.name: RACE_NO_WORMS
message.value: You won't be able to switch back to the {raceName} race. All of your hats will be usable without any restrictions

dictionary.message: A character gets permanent {armor} points to armor
Permanent {hpPct}% health bonus

message.name: ABILITY_UNDERWATER_DESCR
message.value: A hero drowns until it has ground under them

dictionary.message: Poison deals {value}% more damage
Rabbits move faster than other races and jump much higher. To perform double jump, press the key twice

message.name: ABILITY_REGEN_DESCR
message.value: When greatly damaged, the rabbit nervously gnaws a carrot, restoring hit points at the end of each turn of its team

message.name: ABILITY_REVIVAL_DESCR
message.value: Enemies slain by zombie return from the graves to fight their former comrades!

message.name: ABILITY_DMGREDUCTION_DESCR
message.value: It's bad idea to try to destroy zombies by regular bullets! All damage done to them is reduced by {dmgReduction}.

message.name: ABILITY_REVENGE_DESCR
message.value: When a zombie is killed, a bolt of negative energy is unleashed upon its slayer. The bolt does minor damage and places a poison.

message.name: ABILITY_CLIMBING_DESCR
message.value: Cats can climb any walls! Press the jump key twice to take hold.

message.name: ABILITY_PHASING_DESCR
message.value: When the cat is running out of health, it gets a chance to avoid any damage.

message.name: ABILITY_FLYING_DESCR
message.value: Dragons can swing up into the air and soar for a long distance.

message.name: ABILITY_FIERY_PACE_DESCR
message.value: Dragons leave a trail of embers which ignite on the next turn, damaging any enemy that steps on them.

message.name: ABILITY_SHOCK_DESCR
message.value: Deals 30 damage and throw away enemies, which end a turn near robot or attack him in close combat.

message.name: ABILITY_MARK_DESCR
message.value: Reduces the armor of the last attacked target by 20%.

message.name: ABILITY_DROID_DESCR
message.value: Personal defensive droid, which is created at the beginning of robot's turn and lasts till his next turn. In 3 seconds after enemy gets close, the droid emits a charge which breaks enemy's turn. Droid can be destroyed by any attack.

message.name: GIRDER_IMPOSSIBLE
message.value: Girder can't be placed on the ground or in the vicinity of any units

message.name: TELEPORT_IMPOSSIBLE
message.value: Unit can't be teleported in that location!

message.name: ALREADY_ANTITOXIN
message.value: Antitoxin's already used on this unit!

message.name: BANDAGE_USELESS
message.value: Bandage is useless at the moment!

message.name: DOCTOR_BAG_USELESS_NO_ALLIES
message.value: There are no injured allies nearby

message.name: DOCTOR_BAG_USELESS_MAX_HP
message.value: An ally is already at full health

dictionary.message:
My team: {my_team_descr}.
Enemy team: {opponent_team_descr}.

message.name: NOTE_ADD_SUCCESS
message.value: The note has been successfully saved and it will appear on your page

message.name: NOTE_ADD_ERROR
message.value: An error occurred while saving your note

message.name: VIRAL_LETSFIGHT
message.value: My rating in Bombix: {rating}. I am ready to fight!

message.name: STATUS_TEXT
message.value: Do you yearn for new battles? Choose one of the following positions and your friends will respond!

message.name: STATUS_CALL_REQUEST_0
message.value: Enter Bombix. I will break anyone!

message.name: STATUS_CALL_REQUEST_1
message.value: Who wants to fight in Bombix? I am ready

message.name: STATUS_CALL_REQUEST_2
message.value: My bazooka yearns for blood! See you in Bombix!

message.name: STATUS_CALL_REQUEST_3
message.value: I am expecting a challenge to a duel in Bombix!

message.name: SYSPVP_INACTIVITY_DROP
message.value: Player %1 is dropped due to inactivity

message.name: SYSPVP_UNCONFIRMED_EOT
message.value: Player %1 hasn't confirmed the end of their turn

message.name: SYSPVP_LONG_TURN
message.value: The time limit will soon be exceeded!

message.name: DESCR_LOWER_RATING_LEAGUE
message.value: In the world of Bombix there are no secrets or tricks. Opponents respect each other and don't cheat. Do you believe this? Really? This is your league. You are a novice.

message.name: DESCR_FIGHTER_RATING_LEAGUE
message.value: The first rule of Fight league is to point the barrel of the gun at the enemy. Just a little more and you'll learn the secret of success.

message.name: DESCR_VETERAN_RATING_LEAGUE
message.value: Since now you know that Bombix's secret is a really big gun.

message.name: DESCR_MASTER_RATING_LEAGUE
message.value: Willpower - that's what makes difference between master and novice. Only incredible willpower keeps you from gloating, while you push your enemy into the water on the first turn.

message.name: DESCR_ACE_RATING_LEAGUE
message.value: You choose the weapon, not just to win, but to make it spectacular.

message.name: DESCR_RUBY_RATING_LEAGUE
message.value: Only stars are higher than you. And underneath there are stars too. Because it is the Ruby league - everyone is a star here.

message.name: ACHIEVEMENT_MESSAGE_1
message.value: I've got a new achievement in Bombix: '{achievementName}'! Don't believe? Come and play!

message.name: ACHIEVEMENT_MESSAGE_3
message.value: Rumors are told that {userName} got an '{achievementName}' achievement in Bombix. These aren't rumors, by the way, I'm very dangerous!

message.name: NEDD_AWARD_MSG
message.value: To unlock this equipment, you have to take rewards on previous levels

message.name: RESET_AWARDS_MSG
message.value: Do you really want to reset awards for rubies?

message.name: ACTIVITY_СALL_TO_PVP
message.value: My rating in Bombix: {rating}. {name}, come on, let's fight!

message.name: BOSS_GAMEOVER_BONUS_DESCRIPTION
message.value: It was a hard fight, but you prevailed! Here is the reward you deserve:

message.name: BOSS_GAMEOVER_TROPHY
message.value: * Captured items available within in {value} hours

message.name: ONE_DAY_PANEL_NAME
message.value: Hooray! Victory! Now it's time to rest..

message.name: ONE_DAY_PANEL_DESCR
message.value: You can complete only one adventure every day.

message.name: HELP_LEARNING_MISSION_ITEM_MENU
message.value: We strongly recommend that you complete your training before rushing to a real battle.

message.name: LEVEL_NOT_APPROPRIATE_PANEL_NAME
message.value: You are brave! But that's not enough..

message.name: LEVEL_NOT_APPROPRIATE_PANEL_DESCR
message.value: Your level is too low for such serious battles!

message.name: BOSS_GAMEOVER_LOSE_DESCR_1
message.value: This time your enemy is victorious! But next time

message.name: LOSE_GAMEOVER_BOSS_MESSAGE
message.value: Boss {bossName} turned out to be stronger than {userName}

message.name: BOSS_GAMEOVER_DRAW_DESCR
message.value: This is quite uncommon, but both powers are equal! It's time to withdraw and rest.

message.name: DRAW_GAMEOVER_BOSS_MESSAGE
message.value: This is quite uncommon, but both your powers are equal. Time to step back and rest.

message.name: COOPERATIVE_LOSE_GAMEOVER_SUPERBOSS_MESSAGE
message.value: Superboss {bossName} + {bossName2} turned out to be stronger than I and {friendName}

message.name: LOSE_GAMEOVER_SUPERBOSS_MESSAGE
message.value: Superboss {bossName} + {bossName2} turned out to be stronger than {userName}

message.name: COOPERATIVE_LOSE_GAMEOVER_BOSS_MESSAGE
message.value: Boss {bossName} turned out to be stronger than I and {friendName}

message.name: NO_PATH_TEXT
message.value: You cannot attack this boss now, you must clear the path first

message.name: UNLOCK_BOSS_PANEL_TEXT
message.value: Are you sure you want to unlock this boss?

message.name: RETURN_FRIENDS_MENU_MSG
message.value: Nobody to invite back, all your friends are actively playing! Kudos!

message.name: NOTIFY_RETURN_FRIEND
message.value: Don't hesitate, return to Bombix! And get your reward!

message.name: RETURN_FRIENDS_MENU_DESCR_1
message.value: Ask your friends to return to Bombix!

message.name: RETURN_FRIENDS_MENU_DESCR_2
message.value: You'll get this reward for each friend, who accepts your invitation and returns to the game:

message.name: RETURN_FRIEND_REWARD_MENU_DESCR_1
message.value: Did you bring back a friend? Get your well deserved reward!

message.name: RETURN_FRIEND_REQUEST_MENU_DESCR
message.value: Thank your friend that brought you back to the game!

message.name: RETURN_FRIEND_REQUEST_MENU_MSG
message.value: Do you really want to send a reward to this friend?

message.name: RETURN_FRIEND_POST_MSG
message.value: I brought a friend back to the game and got a reward!

message.name: COMEBACK_POST_MSG
message.value: I returned to Bombix and got a reward!

message.name: NOT_TAKEN_AWARD_FOR_ACHIEV
message.value: You don't have any awards for achievements!

message.name: UPDATE_YOUR_PLAYER
message.value: Please update your flash player to the latest version.

message.name: FORBIDDEN_TRANSITION_PAGE
message.value: This user is not your friend

dictionary.message:
It's much more fun to play together!
Sign up with your Facebook account and get 3 rubies!

message.name: FACEBOOK_CONNECTED_BONUS_TEXT
message.value: You've got 3 rubies for signing up with Facebook!

message.name: FACEBOOK_CONNECTED_BONUS_FAIL_TEXT
message.value: Sorry, but this Facebook account is already used in the game.

message.name: NEED_TO_CONNECT_TEXT_SOCIAL_NETWORK
message.value: To add friends to your team please connect your social account.

message.name: CHANGE_NAME_NOTE
message.value: *Changing your name is free the first two times only.

message.name: REPORT_BODY_TEMPLATE
NEED_TO_SETUP_EMAIL
message.value: You have to set up the email before trying to send a message.

message.name: ICLOUD_ENABLE_NEW_ACCOUNT
message.value: Your account will be stored in iCloud and become available on other devices. Continue?

message.name: ICLOUD_ENABLE_ALREADY_HAS_ACCOUNT
message.value: There is already an account in iCloud. Shall we load existing account from iCloud or overwrite with your account? Close this window to cancel.

message.name: ICLOUD_DISABLE_CONTINUE_WITH_SAME_ACCOUNT
message.value: You are going to cancel iCloud synch. Your account will remain in iCloud and will be available on other devices. Continue?

message.name: ICLOUD_DISABLE_CONTINUE_WITH_OTHER_ACCOUNT
message.value: You are going to cancel iCloud synch. Your account will remain in iCloud and will be available on other devices. This device will switch to local account. Continue?

message.name: ICLOUD_TRY_ANOTHER_ACCOUNT
message.value: Your current account is banned. Do you want to use another account from iCloud?

message.name: PVP_MESSAGE
message.value: Online battles. If you win, you get your wager back plus your reward.

message.name: WALL_POST_PLAYER_WIN_BOSS_GUARDIANS_DEPTHS
message.value: I've defeated Guardians of the Depths!

message.name: WALL_POST_PLAYER_WIN_BOSS_PIRATE
message.value: I defeated the pirate Captain! So who's the terror of the sea now?

message.name: WALL_POST_PLAYER_WIN_BOSS_ILLUSIONIST
message.value: I defeated the Illusionist! No more ridiculous tricks!

message.name: WALL_POST_PLAYER_WIN_BOSS_SHAMAN
message.value: I win! Shaman, they said. Even his demons are so pathetic.

message.name: WALL_POST_PLAYER_WIN_BOSS_VIKING
message.value: Vikings are best fighters? I've totally owned them, though they had an advantage.

message.name: WALL_POST_PLAYER_WIN_BOSS_WINDMASTER
message.value: So where's the Wind Master now? Blown away, as I came for him.

message.name: WALL_POST_PLAYER_WIN_BOSS_MINER
message.value: I got rid of the Miner! Eventually, each miner meets his sapper.

message.name: WALL_POST_PLAYER_WIN_BOSS_SAMURAI_CAT
message.value: I defeated this cat. Nine times, to be exact!

message.name: WALL_POST_PLAYER_WIN_BOSS_SERGEANT
message.value: Sergeant... I would've win even if he had 10 healers!

message.name: WALL_POST_PLAYER_WIN_BOSS_BURNING_DEAD
message.value: Told them numerous times not to play with fire. Useless - had to handle it again!

message.name: WALL_POST_PLAYER_WIN_BOSS_WANDERING_SOUL
message.value: Maybe if it would be Warrior, not Wandering Spirit, it could have a chance. Hmpf.

message.name: WALL_POST_PLAYER_WIN_BOSS_YAKUZA
message.value: I defeated Yakuza! Not all of them, of course, but at least three bastards.

message.name: WALL_POST_PLAYER_WIN_BOSS_DEAD_PIRATE
message.value: Water, meteors, ice spikes? Ha! Tactics, skill, flawless victory!

message.name: WALL_POST_PLAYER_WIN_BOSS_ROMEO_JULIET
message.value: They say love kills... They don't know me yet.

message.name: WALL_POST_PLAYER_WIN_BOSS_KING_DEAD
message.value: I waited for him to explode himself for so long... but he didn't. Had to help him.

message.name: WALL_POST_PLAYER_WIN_BOSS_ANCIENT_GHOST
message.value: Finally, a tough opponent!.. Unfortunately for him, I'm not afraid of the storm!

message.name: WATER_START_INCREASING
message.value: The ground is about to go down!

message.name: DEPOSIT_CONSUMPTION_ERROR
message.value: We can't find any new deposits today. May be you already got them today?

message.name: DEPOSIT_MAX_COUNT_LIMIT
message.value: You can't have more then {count} opened deposits.

message.name: GLOBAL_CHAT_NOT_ALLOWED
message.value: Currently global chat is only available to players, who made a purchase within last 30 days.

message.name: NEW_STICKERS_PACK_PURCHASED
message.value: You bought a new pack of stickers!

message.name: PUSHING_MINE_USELESS
message.value: You have to stand near the enemy

message.name: PAYMEN_OPTION_DESCR_RUBY6
message.value: Even a handful of rubies can bring a lot of profits! A couple of the one-off weapons or a reaction boost that's what you need for the victory!

message.name: PAYMEN_OPTION_DESCR_RUBY5
message.value: Now it's more than just a bunch of rubies, now we're talking! But don't rush to spend them all the way - be wiser with your decisions and get some use of them!

message.name: PAYMEN_OPTION_DESCR_RUBY4
message.value: This small bag of rubies can make a good profit if you spend it wisely. That's what you need to get the weapon to dominate the battlefield!

message.name: PAYMEN_OPTION_DESCR_RUBY3
message.value: Now things got real - you can buy cool weapons and equipment to become a real threat for your enemies. Do you want people to fear you? Than that's exactly what you need!

message.name: PAYMEN_OPTION_DESCR_RUBY2
message.value: The old pirate's stash that can be yours. Such treasure can fully equip you with the best items and most powerful weapons!

message.name: PAYMEN_OPTION_DESCR_RUBY1
message.value: Made out of the Kraken's tentacles and raised from the bottom of the sea this chest is bursting with the rubies it holds. With such luxury you can afford the best pieces of equipment to terrorize your enemies

message.name: PAYMEN_OPTION_DESCR_RUBY0
message.value: For those who eager to climb up to the Olimp mountaintop of the best players and observe the others from its height. You afford whatever you crave. But keep in mind you will still need to master your skills.

message.name: PAYMEN_OPTION_DESCR_FUZY6
message.value: Gold always brings luck, at least if you spend it wisely. You might be surprised how small pile of coins can make your life more dynamic and successful!

message.name: PAYMEN_OPTION_DESCR_FUZY5
message.value: Not a small but a big pile, a placer of gold - and you feel this itch for action. When you know you can afford way more than you had before!

message.name: PAYMEN_OPTION_DESCR_FUZY4
message.value: A nice tapping and already heavy bag of coins has a very wide range for applications. Gold always brings more gold, remember that.

message.name: PAYMEN_OPTION_DESCR_FUZY3
message.value: Poor fellow tax collector lost his bag, but we're happy to provide you with it to put it in use. Imagine all the tempting goods in the shop - with this bag they could be yours!

message.name: PAYMEN_OPTION_DESCR_FUZY2
message.value: Just cleaned and polished, this chest full of coins can definitely bring some luck. Take this for granted: you can buy whatever you want with this beauty!

message.name: PAYMEN_OPTION_DESCR_FUZY1
message.value: The gold fever is in the air - remember: the opportunities you get with such a big treasure can get you into troubles, because you could afford many fancy things here!

message.name: PAYMEN_OPTION_DESCR_FUZY0
message.value: Just brought from the Bombix bank heist. No worries, we lockpicked it for you... just to make sure it's full of gold. It seem so. We actually struggle to describe it more - just check ALL of these TREASURES by yourself!!!

message.name: BUNDLE_DESCR
message.value: You will receive random item from list:

message.name: MAIN_SERVER_CONNECTION_CLOSED_LOSE
message.value: You were disconnected from server for too long.

message.name: ALREADY_IN_GAME_LOGIN_TRYING_LIMIT_OUT
message.value: Error trying to login again, please contact the game support or try again later.

dictionary.message:
Yor are not in server's white list.
Your Steam id: {steam_id} is copied to system clipboard

message.name: WEAPON_IMPROVE_NEED
message.value: You have {current} level of this weapon. To unlock upgrades you have to increase it to maximal {max} level.

message.name: WEAPONS_BONUS_TEXT
message.value: Due to changes in weapon system you receive free weapons!

message.name: DOWNGRADE_WEAPONS_COMPENSATION_TEXT
message.value: It appeared that your level is lower than requirements for some of your upgrades. We had to replace them for appropriate version and return you their full value!

message.name: STEAM_OVERLAY_ACTIVATION_NEEDED
message.value: Please activate Steam overlay for purchase enabling.
